lines.text: Loving someone with your whole heart is never wrong.

People spend forever searching and looking, on a journey to nowhere. And you now what? I guess that could've been me, except I found you. And now I know that my journey began and is going to end with you.
All young people think that their love is the greatest love story of all time.
Well ours is.

There's not another face in all the world that... and for weeks it just kept calling out to me, shining like some kind of light in the darkness. The first time I saw your face... or the first time I remember anyway... it was like there was something in me sleeping that was waking up. And I just... I had to... I wasn't thinking, not for a second. I just did what I thought was right and that's why I kissed you. Not to bring you back, but to kind of bring me back to life.
You were my life.
Were?
Don't you see that?
Don't you? When we were locked in the attic together, don't you understand how much I wanted you? I want you now.
The wedding has definitely been called off.
I would hate to waste a perfectly good minister.
What are you gonna do, Caleb... have him for your evening snack?
I'm getting tired of seeing this punk in our faces anyway.
Oh, yeah? Well... your music gives me a headache.
You're a good friend, Chris.
There goes my reputation.
[to Eve]
You are the most attractive, intelligent person I know... next to me, of course.
What's wrong?
Nothing, Lucy-just my face accidentally ran into Jacks fist!
The man you've been referring to happens to be the man of the cloth.
A priest?
No, a fashion designer Of course a priest!
[to Livvie]
Your family tree is a fruit tree.
[Eve is talking about her unborn child]
He's almost here.
How do you know it's a 'he'?
Only men cause this much trouble!
[Finding her purse in Danny's playpen]
Look, I did not put this in the baby's crib!
I told you not to teach him to accessorize at such an early age!
Caleb Morley, you son of a bitch!
For the record, Frank... I am capable of killing you.
[throws a flaming newspaper into the room]
Rafe!
Going somewhere, Goldilocks?
Reese.
You should have worried a little less about Jack... and a bit more for your own safety.
You need to stay away from me.
Or what are you going to do... whine and cry?
I'm warning you.
All you want, little girl... but as soon as I sink my teeth into that scrawny little neck ...
[Alison grabs a chair and knocks Reese down with it, then runs off]
Round one to the princess... but the fun is just beginning.
[she takes off after Alison]

[Alison, pursued by Reese reaches her apartment. She enters and closes the door]
Thank God I lost her... finally... safe and sound.

[Reese appears]
Not quite.
Oh, God!
Well... I am your personal angel of death, and that's God-like enough. Welcome home, sweet pea.
Why are you doing this? Why are you doing this to me?

Because... you hurt my feelings, Alison. I'm very sensitive. You told me I was disgusting. You told me I wasn't worthy of being loved. Do you know how that feels? Never to have been loved? Never to have been worthy of love? Can you even imagine?
No.
Well, then you're about to find out. It's time for you to become one of us.
Oh, please don't... don't do this to me... please.
Let's see how your slayer boyfriend feels when he can't even bear to look at you because you're as disgusting as I am.

[Reese grabs Alison and prepares to bite her]
No, Rafe! No, no! No, please don't do this to me!
Shut up! Shut up! This time you can't stop me, Alison!
No!

[Reese tries to bite Alison but is unable to do it]
What are you doing to me? I'll kill you with my bare hands if I have to!
No, please, don't! Rafe!
Alison!
Rafe!

[Rafe grabs Reese and throws her away from Alison. Reese hits the wall and lands on the floor]
Oh-oh!

[Rafe draws a stake and goes over to finish off Reese]
It's your time now, vampire! You're banished from this world!

[Alison prevent Rafe from killing Reese]
No, don't! Don't.
Alison, what are you doing?
Rafe, don't. Just stop it. Please. Don't.
You lose, slayer.
[she vanishes into thin air]
Rafe ...
What? What is it? Why'd you stop me?
Jack's a big boy. Why don't you let him play like one?
Because I don't trust you, and neither should he.
What, you're afraid I'm going to bite him?
Well, that is what you do, isn't it?
Well, you don't have to worry about that because it's too late.
What?
I already have.
You know, Caleb... my one regret when I thought you were dead was that I wasn't going to get to kill you myself.
Good line... how long have you been waiting to use that one?

[Referring to her looney tunes family]
The whole family tree is full of lunatics, ready to kill!

[after fighting it out with Rafe]
Give your God my regards...
[stabs Rafe with a stake]
Tell Him... thanks for the exercise.

[to Rafe]
Let's clear one thing up... I'm not afraid of anything, halo boy.
Wait, don't tell me... you have garlic around your neck, Jack? Oh come on!
But how...?
Stories...
[sarcastically]
I love linguine carbonara, extra garlic with a little sprig of wolfsbane on the top... wash it down with a big mug of holy water.
This being a shadow of my former self really bites.
I like you, Chris. You are completely amoral.
Jack says... that you're a vampire.
A vampire? How dramatic. He really said that?
What's the matter... bat got your tongue?
Joshua has a Bible.
Well, see? Maybe he's not all bad.
Oh, correction... it's a book of Satanic rituals *disguised* as a Bible.
Jack, you're just jealous. Caleb loves me with a passion you just could never understand.
Or, it's more like the rest of us sees it... one psychopath finding another psychopath.
Okay, I'm a vampire-I'm a vampire
[Opens a bottle of Irish Whiskey and pours himself a glass]
But I got one thing going for me... I'm a *Irish* vampire.
I hope you die.
Been there, done that.
Who in their right mind would help us?
Are you saying we're not well liked?

[Referring to having been drugged by Joshua]
I just feel cold and sick.
Joshua had that effect on lots of women.
I almost believed you there for a second. You really like picking on me, don't you?
It helps pass the time.

[to Rafe, referring to Alison]
Oh, she's just throwing another one of her drama queen fits.
Oh, please! I'm a drama queen? You're the definition of it.
Oh, I'm just an amateur compared to you.
It's really pretty. Where did you get it?
That's none of your business, bitch.
Alison's cell phone. Hello? Hello?
Caleb? You bastard. What'd you do with Alison? Why do you have her phone?
Oh, you'll have to speak up. These cellular connections...
What have you done with her? If you do anything to hurt her or harm her, I swear...
I'm sorry. Can you hear me now? Can you hear me now?

[Alison and Livvie switched personalities because of a wish made with Caleb's magic ring]
Admit that you are trying to get Rafe back into your bed.
That's not true, I love Caleb.

Oh, I'm sure you do, don't you? And I bet your love is just as bright as the sun, and as deep and wide as the ocean, and as fluffy as a little lamb, and blah, blah, blah... if I was a diabetic, I just might keel over.

[Referring to Caleb being a vampire]
I know this sounds farfetched...
Far fetched? It is a little bit. I think Caleb is dangerous, yes... but I don't think he's hanging in the rafters in his spare time, do you?

[Referring to her crazy family]
The whole family tree is full of lunatics, ready to kill!
Okay, I'm a vampire-I'm a vampire
[Opens a bottle of Irish Whiskey and pours himself a glass]
But I got one thing going for me... I'm a *Irish* vampire.
[He downs the glass]
